song.englishname: Let Me Show You The Way

english.segment1: I'm looking at you. Old friend of mine. It's no use pretending. That everything's fine. Now don't be so brave. Don't be so prous. I want you to know that. I'm here for you now
english.segment2: I can see you hurting and it's hurting me. It doesn't have to be this way
english.segment3: CHORUS: If you'd let me hold you. Closer. Let me know you. Let me show you the way
english.segment4: I'm feeling for you. Feeling so much. When this heart is big enough. For the both of us. I'll give you my love. If you give me your pain. I'll hold it inside of me. Til you're stronger again
english.segment5: Well I hate seeing you so far away. When not a word can say enough
english.segment6: I'll be your rock for this day. When I hear you calling out my name. Cause I know you'd only do the same for me
english.segment7: Somebody gonna hold your head up. Somebody gonna see you right. Somebody gonna show you the light
